summary: The src package delivers a Flask-based web application for managing bibliographic references, encompassing routes for listing, adding, editing, and deleting entries, utilities for validating reference identifiers, database setup and maintenance via SQLAlchemy, and functions to generate downloadable BibTeX files.
business_intent: Enable users to efficiently create, maintain, and export citation data through an intuitive web interface, ensuring data integrity and providing ready-to-use BibTeX output for academic publishing.
